mapper.sql: a.id, a.user_id, a.app_id, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.office_id AS "office.id", so.name AS "office.name", a.create_date, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date, a.del_flag, a.remarks, um.name AS "user.name", um.login_name AS "user.loginName", ap.url AS "frontApp.appUrl", ap.name AS "frontApp.appName", uc.name AS "createBy.name"

LEFT JOIN mht_base.sys_user um ON um.id = a.user_id LEFT JOIN mht_portal.cms_front_app ap ON ap.id = a.app_id LEFT JOIN mht_base.sys_user uc ON uc.id = a.create_by LEFT JOIN mht_base.sys_office AS so ON so.id = a.office_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mht_portal.portal_user_app_record( id, user_id, app_id, office_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{user.id}, #{frontApp.id}, #{office.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks} )
